entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.error.is_op: You can't open a loot ball while it's being opened!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.error.alrea: This loot ball has already been opened!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.error.coold: You must wait %s seconds before opening again!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.info.no_loo: This loot ball has no loot!
entity.cobbleloots.loot_ball.set.item: Loot Ball content was set to: %s [×%s]
item.cobbleloots.loot_ball.custom_textur: A loot ball with a custom texture!
item.cobbleloots.loot_ball.tooltip.1: A mysterious ball that contains loot!
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.chunks: A hidden loot ball was detected within a 2-chunk radius!
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.near: A hidden loot ball is near!
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.tooltip: Right click to search for HIDDEN loot balls within a 2-chunk radius
item.cobbleloots.dowsing_machine.very_ne: A hidden loot ball is VERY near!
event.cobbleloots.loot_ball.spawn.specia: A special loot ball has spawned!
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.title: Cobbleloots Settings
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.loot_ball_emp: Determines what happens when a loot ball has no uses left.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.loot_ball_bon: Probability (0.0 - 1.0) of any loot ball being a bonus one.
Multiplier applied to the item count when you open a bonus loot ball.
Determines if bonus loot balls should spawn invisibly to make them harder to find.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.loot_ball_eff: If enabled, particles and floating items will appear when opening a loot ball.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.loot_ball_xp_: If enabled, loot balls can give XP to the player upon opening.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.data_pack_dis: List of loot ball IDs (e.g., 'cobbleloots:loot_ball/poke') to disable.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.loot_ball_def: Default amount of XP contained in a new loot ball.
Default number of times a loot ball can be opened. Use negative values for infinite uses.
Default cooldown in ticks for a player to re-open a multi-use loot ball. (0 = Disabled, cannot re-open).
Default despawn time in ticks (0 = Never).
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_en: Master switch for Loot Ball world generation.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_ch: Probability of generating in a valid chunk.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_at: Number of placement attempts per chunk.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_ch: Maximum number of loot balls allowed to generate in a single chunk.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_di: List of dimension IDs where world generation is disabled.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_enab: Master switch for dynamic loot ball spawning.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_chan: Probability of a successful spawn attempt.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_cool: Minimum time (in ticks) between spawn attempts. (1 second = 20 ticks).
Maximum time (in ticks) between spawn attempts.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_desp: Time (in ticks) before a spawned loot ball despawns. Set to 0 to disable despawning.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_disa: List of dimension IDs where spawning is disabled.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_enabl: If enabled, players can fish up loot balls.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_chanc: The chance to fish up a loot ball when catching something.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_luck_: Multiplier applied to fishing chance per level of the Luck of the Sea enchantment.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_despa: Time (in ticks) before a fishing loot ball despawns. Set to 0 to disable despawning.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_disab: List of dimension IDs where fishing loot balls is disabled.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.archaeology_d: List of dimension IDs where archaeology loot balls is disabled.
